testcase.name: S.2.7.(b) - Duplicated of xbrli:xbrl/xbrli:context / 2.21 - Duplicates of xbrli:xbrl/xbrli:unit
testcase.description: An instance document MUST NOT contain duplicated contexts or units, unless required for technical reasons, e.g. to support XBRL streaming .

variation.description: XBRL instance with no duplication of xbrli:context or xbrli:unit.
XBRL instance with duplicated xbrl:context (different id).
XBRL instance with duplicated xbrl:context (different order of dimensions and different id).
XBRL instance with duplicated xbrl:unit (different id).
XBRL instance with duplicated xbrli:content and xbrl:unit.
